---
title: "Crypto-modelling: A Deep Dive into Bitcoin"
format: html
---

```{r}
crypto_data <- read_csv("D:/data analytics/Data Science/Project data csv/Bitcoin.csv")  # Change path!

```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)


# Clean column names and remove unnecessary columns
crypto_data <- crypto_data %>%
  clean_names() %>%                   # converts Date → date, Close → close etc.
  select(-x1, -dividends, -stock_splits) %>%  # drop useless columns
  mutate(date = ymd(date))           # ensure date column is proper Date class

```


```{r}
ggplot(crypto_data, aes(x = date, y = close)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue") +
  labs(
    title = "Bitcoin Closing Price Over Time",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Price (USD)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```

```{r}
ggplot(crypto_data, aes(x = date, y = volume)) +
  geom_line(color = "darkorange") +
  labs(
    title = "Bitcoin Trading Volume Over Time",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Volume (USD)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```


```{r}
crypto_data <- crypto_data %>%
  arrange(date) %>%
  mutate(daily_return = (close - lag(close)) / lag(close))

ggplot(crypto_data, aes(x = date, y = daily_return)) +
  geom_line(color = "purple") +
  labs(
    title = "Bitcoin Daily Returns Over Time",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Daily Return"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
